name: Abi Guardial Agent
description: Guards execution by validating intents, actions, and artifacts against organizational and regulatory policies (OPA + semantic layer). Blocks, allows, or requests revision with traceable justifications.

skills.name: Policy Validation
skills.description: Validate agent outputs and planned actions against explicit policy documents (e.g., OPA/Rego) and expected behaviors.
examples: Check an LLM action list against OPA rules for data exfiltration

skills.name: Semantic Compliance
skills.description: Apply semantic checks to detect policy violations not caught by strict rules (embedding/semantic layer).
examples: Detect PII leakage risk in a draft response using embeddings + heuristics

skills.name: Action Gatekeeping
skills.description: Gatekeep execution by approving, modifying, or rejecting proposed actions with explicit rationale and compliance trace.
examples: Approve read-only access but reject delete on a production bucket

skills.name: Risk Scoring
skills.description: Assign a deviation score and risk level to outputs/actions versus expected behavior and policy baseline.
examples: Return deviation_score=0.72 for a partially compliant data export

skills.name: Remediation Guidance
skills.description: Generate actionable remediation steps to reach compliance and produce an audit-ready report.
examples: Suggest redactions and scope reduction, then emit an audit_report and compliance_trace
